sentences.en: The drying Tramontane wind began to blow shortly afterwards, preventing rot.
sentences.cn: 稍后吹起了干燥的风, 防止了葡萄腐烂.

words.tran_cn: 野蛮的；来自群山彼边的

trans.tran_cn: 野蛮的，来自群山彼边的
trans.tran_en: being or coming from the far side of the mountains, esp from the other side of the Alps as seen from Italy
